Configuration.Name: Alma Unmediated E-Lending Server Addon
Configuration.Author: Robert T. Wilson, University of Minnesota
Configuration.Description: Checks Alma/Primo API to see if a requested item is licensed for ILL.

Setting.name: BaseUrl
Setting.Description: The base URL for Ex Libris APIs.

Setting.name: ProcessQueue
Setting.Description: The addon will process transactions sitting in this status.

Setting.name: SuccessQueue
Setting.Description: Where to move the transaction if the license IS permitted.

Setting.name: DenyQueue
Setting.Description: Where to move the transaction if the license IS NOT permitted.

Setting.name: NotFoundQueue
Setting.Description: Where to move the transaction if no record is found in Primo.

Setting.name: AutoRoute
Setting.Description: If true, transactions will be moved to queues automatically.
